Some	couples	find	having	
sex very enjoyable during 
pregnancy, while others simply 
feel that they donâ€™t want to 
have	sex.	You	can	find	other	
ways of being intimate or 
of making love. The most 
important thing is to talk about 
your feelings with each other.
While sex is safe for most 
couples in pregnancy, it may 
not be all that easy. You will 
probably	need	to	find	different	
positions. This can be a time 
to explore  and experiment 
together.
